history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HB04944
FULL TITLE : AN ACT PROVIDING FOR FREE QUALITY HIGHER EDUCATION AND CREATING THE FREE QUALITY HIGHER EDUCATION VOUCHER SYSTEM, AND APPROPRIATING FUNDS THEREFOR
SHORT TITLE : " Free Quality Higher Education Act Of 2016 "
ABSTRACT : States that "there shall be a higher education voucher system for students in both public and private higher education institutions under the Free Quality Higher Education Program. Provides that the said HEV shall entitle the holder to quality higher education in any qualified participating State University of College (SUC)or Private Higher Education Institution (PHEI)
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : NOGRALES, KARLO ALEXEI B., NOGRALES, JERICHO JONAS B.
DATE FILED : 2017-02-01
SIGNIFICANCE: NATIONAL
CO-AUTHORS (Journal Entries) :
1. Fortun (083 2017-03-15)2. Del Rosario (083 2017-03-15)
3. Campos (022 2017-09-11)
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE
COMMITEE HEARINGS/ACTIONS:
      1. Approved by the Committee on 2017-03-06
      2. Scheduled for meeting/hearing on 2017-05-10
      3. Approved by the Committee on Appropriations on 2017-05-10
